attributes.action: Implement Votes for Life legislation before EU referendum
attributes.additional_details:
The government proposed legislation in the Queen's Speech to remove this arbitrary limit - see pages 96 & 97 in the briefing pack on the Queen's Speech:
https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/430149/QS_lobby_pack_FINAL_NEW_2.pdf

with objective of:
"End the disenfranchisement after an arbitrary 15 years of British citizens living abroad"

Cross party report from 20th March 2014:
http://www.hansardsociety.org.uk/our-forgotten-voters-british-citizens-abroad/
attributes.background:
UK Citizens living abroad are directly affected by the EU Referendum.

There's an arbitrary 15yr limit on UK Expatriates voting in UK elections/referenda. The Government's "Votes for Life" acknowledges this. But, they will not implement it until after the referendum.

This is not democratic.
